attributes.action: Tell us if it is because they can put it on their expenses scam that politicians support the BBC Licence Tax.
attributes.additional_details: If I could get the taxpayer to pay the mortgage I would have second homes all over the country.  If the BBC was free at the point of use I would say that we should keep it.  Because I have to pay for it under threat of criminalisation, and because it is being used as a means of huge enrichment of members of the establishment, I say the BBC should be commercialised (mainly to see how long it would last) at midnight tonight.
